mapper.insert: insert into hospital..maintenance (risk_value, formulator, reviewer, form_time, cycle_rule, "cycle", plan_type, "status", project_list, risk_level, eq_id, "name", maintenance_results, instrument_status, description, maintenance_personnel, check_time, department_receipt, date_of_completion) values (#{riskValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formulator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycleRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintenanceResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrumentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintenancePersonnel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateOfCompletion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

risk_value,
formulator,

mapper.select:
SELECT eq.eq_id as id ,eq.eq_name as name , eq.eq_sbbh as num , eq.eq_xh as model ,eq.eq_gg as specification , m.risk_level as riskLevel ,m.risk_value as riskValue,bm.bm_name as bmName FROM eq_info as eq LEFT JOIN maintenance as m on eq.eq_id = m.eq_id , s_bm as bm
bm.bm_name like #{bmName} and
eq.eq_name like #{eqName} and
m.risk_level = #{riskLevel} and
eq.eq_bmid = bm.bm_id
mapper.update:
update maintenance
risk_value = #{riskValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
formulator = #{formulator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reviewer = #{reviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
form_time = #{formTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cycle_rule = #{cycleRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cycle = #{cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_type = #{planType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_list = #{projectList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
risk_level = #{riskLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eq_id = #{eqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"name" = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintenance_personnel = #{maintenancePersonnel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_receipt = #{departmentReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_of_completion = #{dateOfCompletion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select eq_id as id , eq_name as name from eq_info
eq_bmid = #{bmName} and
eq_pym = #{pym} and
sbcs_id_scs = #{factory} and
eq_xh = #{model} and
eq_cxfl_id = #{similarClass} and
1=1

SELECT id as id , name as name , form_time as recordTime , plan_type as planType ,status as status from maintenance as m
"name" like #{planName} and
form_time >= #{beginTime} and
form_time <= #{endTime} and
status = #{status} and
1=1
